snippet.title: Torchlight Frontiers - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sign up for updates, exclusive content, beta tests, and more at https://www.torchlightfrontiers.com 


Introducing the next iteration of the award-winning Torchlight series: Torchlight Frontiers! 

Set in the same beloved universe as Torchlight I and II, this shared-world action-RPG brings back many of the franchise’s signature features and mechanics that captured the hearts of ARPG fans around the world. Led by former Runic Games and Blizzard North co-founder, Max Schaefer, the team developing Torchlight Frontiers is comprised of veteran developers who were responsible for the games that defined the ARPG genre, including the original Diablo and Torchlight franchises. 

Torchlight Frontiers combines the heart of the beloved Torchlight series with a shared, persistent and dynamically generated world. In true Torchlight style, players will team up with friends and devoted pets to hack and slack their way through a vibrant world, discover ancient ruins of lost civilizations and brave dungeons filled with riches and dangerous creatures. Additional details about Torchlight Frontiers will be revealed at a later date. 

Torchlight Frontiers will be available on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation®4. 


Learn more: https://www.TorchlightFrontiers.com 
Like: https://www.facebook.com/PlayTorchlight 
Follow: https://twitter.com/PlayTorchlight 
Watch: https://www.twitch.tv/PlayTorchlight
